video_prompt: Person brings red rose to parted lips, head slightly tilted, eyes looking up. Hair subtly shifts as they move. Background colors subtly transition.
image_prompt:
**Prompt:**

Vertical close-up, high-angle shot of a person with fair skin and dark, tousled hair holding a vibrant red rose to their lips. They wear a white unbuttoned shirt. Their left eye is open, looking slightly up and left. A silver dangle earring is visible. The background softly blends from blue-gray to purple to peach. Soft, even lighting emphasizes the rose and features.
refined_video_prompt: A person slowly moves a rose towards their lips. Their head subtly adjusts its incline, and their eyes gently lift their gaze upwards. A fleeting sense of contemplation briefly crosses their expression. Hair subtly shifts with the movement. Background colors subtly transition and alter.
